game.title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
game.synopsis: In this open-world action adventure game, players explore a vast land filled with puzzles, mysteries, and enemies as they take on the role of Link, a hero who must save the kingdom of Hyrule from an ancient evil.

beginning.text: The game begins with Link waking up in a shrine, with no memory of who he is or how he got there. He sets out on a quest to find the truth about himself and save Hyrule.

ending.text: The game ends with Link defeating the final boss, Calamity Ganon, and saving Hyrule from destruction.
